data.name: PEG0001_ERROR_NoRulesDefined
data.value: No grammar rules were defined.

data.value: The rule '{0}' has already been defined.

data.value: The referenced rule '{0}' does not exist.

data.value: The rule '{0}' is left-recursive.

data.value: The setting '{0}' has already been specified.

data.name: PEG0006_WARNING_SettingUnknown
data.value: The setting '{0}' is not recognized.

data.name: PEG0007_ERROR_PrefixAlreadyDeclared
data.value: A prefix '{0}' cannot be declared here because it would give a different meaning to '{0}' which is already declared in the current scope.

data.name: PEG0008_ERROR_PARSER_UnexpectedEndOfInput
data.value: Unexpected character '{0}'.

data.value: Unterminated string literal.

data.name: PEG0010_ERROR_PARSER_UnterminatedClass
data.value: Unterminated character class.

data.name: PEG0011_ERROR_PARSER_UnterminatedCode
data.value: Unterminated code section.

data.name: PEG0012_ERROR_SettingValueInvalid
data.value: The value '{0}' is invalid for the '{1}' setting.

data.name: PEG0013_WARNING_FlagUnknown
data.value: The flag '{0}' is not recognized.

data.name: PEG0014_ERROR_PARSER_InvalidType
data.value: Invalid type definition.

data.name: PEG0015_WARNING_QuantifierInvalid
data.value: This quantifier will always fail to match.

data.name: PEG0016_ERROR_ResourcesNotSpecified
data.value: Resource-based literal expressions require a 'resources' setting.

data.name: PEG0017_WARNING_UnusedRule
data.value: The rule '{0}' is never used.

data.name: PEG0018_WARNING_UnreachableAlternative
data.value: Unreachable branch detected.

data.name: PEG0019_ERROR_UnknownType
data.value: Could not determine a type for the rule '{0}'.

data.name: PEG0020_ERROR_UnmemoizedLeftRecursion
data.value: The rule '{0}' is left-recursive. Left-recursive rules must be memoized. Mark this rule with the '-memoize' flag or eliminate the left-recursion.

data.name: PEG0021_ERROR_ZeroWidthRepetition_Certain
data.value: Repetition of a zero-width expression with no maximum repetition count will result in an infinite loop.

data.name: PEG0021_WARNING_ZeroWidthRepetition_Possible
data.value: Repetition of a zero-width expression with no maximum repetition count may result in an infinite loop.

data.name: PEG0022_WARNING_ZeroWidthRepetition_Certain
data.value: Repetition of a zero-width expression will always result in the maximum repetition count.

data.name: PEG0022_WARNING_ZeroWidthRepetition_Possible
data.value: Repetition of a zero-width expression may always result in the maximum repetition count.

data.name: PEG0023_ERROR_AmbiguousLeftRecursionDetected
data.value: The rule '{0}' is ambiguously left-recursive. ({1})

data.name: PEG0024_WARNING_UnusedDelimiter
data.value: The delimiter is never used.

data.name: PEG0025_WARNING_LowercaseExportedRule
data.value: The rule '{0}' is exported. Exported rule names should begin with an uppercase letter.

data.name: PEG0025_WARNING_LowercasePublicRule
data.value: The rule '{0}' is public. Public rule names should begin with an uppercase letter.

data.name: PEG0026_ERROR_PARSER_CharacterClassFlagsUnrecognized
data.value: The character class flags '{0}' were unrecognized.

data.name: PEG0026_ERROR_PARSER_StringFlagsUnrecognized
data.value: The string flags '{0}' were unrecognized.

data.name: PEG0027_ERROR_WrongNumberOfOutputFiles
data.value: The number of output files must match the number of input files.

data.name: Usage
data.value: Usage: pegasus file
